models

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.Model
      • models.User
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class User
extends Model
implements java.io.Serializable
    A box for storing basic user data. The stored data are the username, the hashed password and the user profile.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      User(java.lang.String username, char[] rawPass)
      Creates a User with given username and proper password(will be stored as a hash).

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        Compares this user to the given object. The result is true if and only if the argument is not null and is a User object that represents a user with the same username and password.
        Overrides:
